text: Luiz Martins (born 29 July 1917) is a Brazilian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions and 50 metre rifle, prone events at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Brazilian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Brazil Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: Luiz Martins
